name: apt
description: Use ``apt`` to install and manage packages. Deprecated in favor of ``charmlibs.apt``.

name: architecture
description: Shared code between the ``mysql`` and ``mysql-k8s`` charms.

name: async_replication
description: Shared code between the ``mysql`` and ``mysql-k8s`` charms.

name: awsjuju
description: Legacy library for managing AWS resources.

name: backups
description: Shared code between the ``mysql`` and ``mysql-k8s`` charms.

name: capture_events
description: Helper for legacy harness tests. New charms should write state-transition tests with ``ops[testing]`` instead.

name: cert_handler
description: Wraps the requirer side of the ``tls-certificates-interface`` charm's ``tls_certificates`` lib.

name: charm_logging
description: Add charm code logging to logs sent via ``loki_push_api``.

name: charm_tracing
description: Provided by the ``tempo-coordinator-k8s`` charm. Consider using ``ops[tracing]`` instead.

name: charm_tracing
description: Deprecated in favour of the ``tempo-coordinator-k8s`` charm's libs. New charms should use ``ops[tracing]`` for tracing charm code instead.

name: charm-api
description: Experimental API for writing charms.

name: charm-helpers
description: Pre-Ops library used by reactive charms.

name: charm-json
description: JSON typed relation data – unnecessary with Ops 2.23+ due to the addition of typed relation data.

name: charm-refresh
description: In-place rolling refreshes of stateful charmed applications.

name: charm-refresh-build-version
description: Workaround for a Charmcraft issue.

name: charm-upgrade
description: Alias for charm-refresh? (Repo URL redirects.)

name: charmed-kubeflow-chisme
description: Used internally by the Charmed Kubeflow team.

name: charmed-service-mesh-helpers
description: Used internally by the Service Mesh team.

name: charmlibs.apt
description: Use ``apt`` to install and manage packages.

name: charmlibs.pathops
description: Substrate agnostic file operations.

name: charmlibs.snap
description: Use ``snapd`` to install and manage packages.

name: charms.contextual_status
description: Context manager based library for setting charm statuses.

name: charms.docker
description: Legacy library used by the ``docker-layer`` reactive charm.

name: charms.proxylib
description: A library that helps charms direct HTTP requests and subprocess calls through the model-configured proxy environment.

name: charms.reactive
description: Legacy library used to implement reactive charms.

name: charms.reconciler
description: Handle all Juju events in an Ops-based charm with a single method.

name: charms.templating.jinja2
description: Legacy library for Jinja templating in reactive charms.

name: client
description: Perform ``zookeeper`` operations.

name: coordinated-workers
description: Abstractions for charms following the coordinator-worker pattern, used by Observability Team.

name: cosl
description: Used internally by the Observability Charm Engineering Team. A dependency (via ``PYDEPS``) of popular charm libs such as ``loki_push_api``.

name: data_models
description: ``pydantic``-based typed relation data – unnecessary with Ops 2.23+ due to the addition of typed relation data.

name: data_secrets
description: Secrets-related helpers for interfaces. Deprecated in favour of the ``data-platform-libs.data_inferfaces`` interface lib.

name: data-platform-helpers
description: Used internally by the Data Charm Engineering team.

name: dnf
description: Use ``dnf`` to install and manage packages – modern charms all run on Ubuntu, so this shouldn't be needed.

name: evt_sequences
description: Helper for legacy harness tests. New charms should write state-transition tests with ``ops[testing]`` instead.

name: grub
description: Use GRUB to manage kernel configuration.

name: helper_cos
description: Relies on ``data_platform_helpers``.

name: hpc-libs
description: Used internally by HPC charms.

name: juju_systemd_notices
description: Use ``systemd`` to observe and emit notices when services change state.

name: juju_topology
description: Deprecated in favour of ``cosl.juju_topology.JujuTopology``.

name: jujubigdata
description: Legacy library for developing Big Data charms.

name: jujuresources
description: Legacy library for loading binary resources. New charms should use ``ops.Model.resources``.

name: kubernetes_compute_resources_patch
description: Patch Kubernetes compute resource limits.

name: kubernetes_service_patch
description: Deprecated in favour of ``ops.Unit.set_ports``.

name: metrics_endpoint_discovery
description: Discover metric endpoints exposed by applications deployed to a K8s cluster.

name: mongo-charms-single-kernel
description: Used internally by the Data Charm Engineering team.

name: multus
description: Use the Multus Kubernetes Container Network Interface.

name: mysql
description: Shared code between the ``mysql`` and ``mysql-k8s`` charms.

name: oci-image
description: Work with OCI images in podspec charms. New Kubernetes charms should use the sidecar pattern. Repo archived in March 2024.

name: ops_reactive_interface
description: Helper for interface library developers, to allow an Ops-based interface library to interact with legacy, reactive charms.

name: ops.manifest
description: Work with Kubernetes manifests.

name: passwd
description: Manage Linux users and groups.

name: pgb
description: Shared code between ``pgbouncer`` and ``pgbouncer-k8s`` charms.

name: postgresql
description: Shared code between the ``posgresql`` and ``postgresql-k8s`` charms.

name: rollingops
description: Perform "rolling" operations across units, for example rolling restarts.

name: s3_helpers
description: Shared code between the ``mysql`` and ``mysql-k8s`` charms.

name: sborl
description: Legacy library for implementing interface libraries. New interface libraries can use the typed relation data feature available in Ops 2.23+.

name: serialized-data-interface
description: Relation data validation – use the features available in Ops instead.

name: snap
description: Use ``snapd`` to install and manage packages. Deprecated in favor of ``charmlibs.snap``.

name: sysctl
description: Create and configure ``sysctl`` options.

name: systemd
description: Use ``systemd`` to start, stop, and manage system services.

name: tls
description: Shared code between the ``mysql`` and ``mysql-k8s`` charms.

name: upgrade
description: Manage in-place upgrades. Deprecated in favour of ``charm-refresh``.
